Control Name: 3.7.3 You have identified the human and environmental resources needed to create performance tests.
Control Statement: Successfully implementing meaningful performance tests requires a number of resources. If is not just a single developer or QA Analyst running some tests on their local machine. Instead, performance tests need a test environment (also known as a test bed) that tests can be executed against without interfering with production environments and data.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 3.7 How are you testing to ensure that you workload can appropriately handle user load?
